firstCard.heading: Canadian Higher Education
firstCard.description: We wish to raise awareness of the excellence of Canadian higher education... (more text)

secondCard.heading: Scholarship Opportunities
secondCard.description: CHEH is a member driven organization aimed at promoting Canadian higher education and enabling Canadians and international student to attend the University and program of their choice. Should you be selected for a scholarship, CHEH will credit your student account at your chosen institution once proof of registration is received. For now your task is: complete the online application form including the short essay on ‘why I want to attend a Canadian University’. CHEH will notify winners of their awards and then arrange to credit winners’ student account with scholarship funds upon receipt of proof of registration. (Less text here, this on the reistration page)

thirdCard.heading: Domestic and International Students
thirdCard.description: CHEH wishes to enrich the Canadian campus with the best and brightest students from Canada and around the world... (more text)

aboutUs.heading: About the Canadian Higher Education House
aboutUs.content: Welcome to the Canada Higher Education House. CHEH is committed to spreading the word about the quality of higher education in Canada. We aim to create opportunities for students from Canada and around the world to attend College or University with the support of earned scholarships. CHEH’s comprehensive site will tell you more about the programs available at institutions across Canada as well as how you may earn scholarship support to attend. Come join us.
